title: Elegant Jazz Music Pack
description: 43 tracks & 1h 8 mins of classy Jazz music
longDescription:
This collection of elegant and smooth jazz music tracks is perfect for use as background music in video games that feature a relaxed, sophisticated atmosphere. The tracks are characterized by their mellow and relaxing nature, featuring a set of unique, original melodies with a gentle and groovy tempo, making them suitable for a wide range of game genres, such as city-building, construction and management simulation and puzzle games.


Demos of every full-length track included within the pack are available at the link below:

YOUTUBE PLAYLIST PREVIEW


The collection features a range of instrumentation, including saxophones, pianos, bass, drums and percussion, playing together to create a sense of luxury and class, providing perfect background music that will enhance the gameplay experience, give your game a distinct identity and immerse the players in a relaxing and calming atmosphere.

All songs are presented in their main ending structure and as loopable tracks. Stingers suitable as intros and outros are also available (please check the information below).
